properties.name: First time on the other side, The Works, New York City
properties.description: Posted by Onalongtaxiride428 Columbus Ave., New York, NY This was the very first gay bar I ever set foot in...the first of well more than 1,000...maybe 2,000? It was March 1992, and the experience proved fortuitous - I met a cute Columbia University grad student from Peru, and we wandered back to his place. It was never so easy to walk up to a stranger and buy him a beer, probably because I didn\'t know any better. His name was Andreas, and I never saw him again. My friend Bob had taken me to the bar, thinking I was straight and merely being a good sport to go with him. When I told Bob I was leaving with this new friend, he grabbed my shoulder in a panic and asked if I understood exactly *what* the guy had in mind. I assured Bob that I knew exactly what I was in for (or at least hoped I was in for), and so began my sordid life of gay-bar-hopping.
